SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There's something here!
Let's dig it up.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG_000_CUT_010_030.text: Guess it's useful somehow, so wooo!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.text:
It's saying something or other
about the sand's energy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.text:
Apparently it'll keep the sand
from falling apart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.text:
Sounds like it'll keep the sand
from clumping together.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.text:
It's talking about the sand's
shifting ability.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.text: Oh, this could come in handy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.text: I'm pretty handy too, you know!

SUB_W13_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, wow, a desert. Not a place that works
in my favor, but I guess I can't complain. Well, first things first, I should find
somebody who knows about this world.

SUB_W13_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Man, there is just sand EVERYWHERE!
Also, I can't seem to fly here,
so I guess I'm hoofing it. Pfth! AND I've got sand
in my mouth! Blech.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Man, that ship is HUGE! Also, old.
I guess that means this desert
used to be an ocean.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I wonder what happened here...
Did the water spirits' power wane,
or did other spirits get stronger?
Also, what do we have here!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sure can! I haven't seen a human out this way
in days and days. Where exactly did you come
from, anyway? The airship? The cruise ship?
The submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Actually, my name's Ameya Aisling,
and I'm a witch from Pulchra.
Um, have you seen a cat anywhere?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
A cat? No, I don't know any cats.
The humans might know something, though,
so you should head over to the airship.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Okay, so I just got here, which means I
don't really know boo about this world.
Think you take me to the airship?
Also, what's your name?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm Scarecrow—although why I'm a scarecrow,
I have no earthly idea. But I'd be delighted
to guide you! I'm bored to tears with all
this standing around. Follow me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One airship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Huh. I can't go any further—the flow of
sand is way too strong. Maybe a little
magic will get things going...? Nope. That didn't work.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Didn't think there'd be machines here.
Does this thing even work?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
YO, SCARECROW! BEEN A HOT MINUTE, BUDDY!
ALSO, WHY ARE YOU WANDERING ALL OVER FROM
HELL TO BREAKFAST WITH THIS HUMAN, HUH!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: You can change the flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
ME? NAH! I CAN'T DO SQUAT, BUDDY!
BUT THE ROBOT CAN!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
OKAY, BUT I'M RIGHT HERE,
SO MAYBE STOP YELLING!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
SORRY ABOUT THAT! THIS IS JUST THE NATURAL
VOLUME FOR ME! NOW HANG ON AND I'LL GET
THAT SAND CHANGED FOR YOU, BUDDY!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Not much of an airship considering
it's stuck on the ground like this.
Do people really live here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh sure! Lots of 'em!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Wow, it's a lot more spacious in here than
I thought! Also no sand? I think a witch
could get used to this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm Ameya Aisling, a witch from Pulchra.
Sounds like you don't usually get visitors
from the outside, huh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Actually, we never get such visitors. But as you are clearly standing here now, it could mean the legend of Pandora is real! You must tell me everything you know about Pandora! Speak, I beg you!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Only if you slow your roll
a little bit first!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Yes, do slow your roll.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Shut up, strawman! ...AHEM! Yes, well,
I suppose it's possible I got a smidge
excited there. Apologies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm the Professor, and I'm researching the history
of the Crowrealm. Though a desert now, this land
once had something called an 'ocean,' and this
very airship once soared through the skies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Alas, now the world has turned to sand,
and the airships lie in pieces on the ground.
And what is the cause of this misery, you ask?
The answer to that...is said to be Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Feels like I've heard that word before.
Maybe something about a box?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Indeed, legend claims a human from the outside opened the box and brought great misfortune to the world—and it goes on to say the one to close the box will be another human from the outside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, how I hope the legend is a lie. If it's true,
it means our world is held sway by the whims
of outsiders! And in that case, what are the
rest of us even worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Right? What's my worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I don't really know if this legend
involves me, but I'm super curious!
So where can I find this thing?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It's just a legend, my dear. Nothing more.
Do you truly intend to follow it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Legends aren't for following—I follow my heart.
Also, I have a feeling my green lines are telling
me look for Pandora, 'cause I think that's where
I'm going to find my missing cat.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I don't know if I should call you an oddity or a nosy parker... Are all people from the outside like you? Er, anyway. Be that all as it may, I sadly have no idea where Pandora is. You'll just have to find it yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oooh, oooh! I know where it is!
It could be here. Or there.
Or way out there someplace.
Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let me leave you with this warning:
Do not make friends with the scarecrows.
They're all irresponsible oafs to the last,
just like this straw-headed ninny here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Did you guys make them?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Perish the thought! If I had to guess,
I imagine they came from Pandora itself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
That's another humongous machine!
I sure hope Pandora isn't in here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So there are fiends in this world, too?
Does the legend claim that the fiends
came from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So you know nothing. Great.
Well, guess it's time to peek inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Guess I'm glad there was no Pandora.
Let's go!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
And I hope you'll help us out if the
shifting sands block us again!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Another machine? You're not going to tell me this is Pandora, are you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hi there. Hey. This metal hunk
isn't Pandora, is it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Wait, so it is? Or not?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, I suppose someone would have noticed
already if Pandora was just sitting here,
so let's check somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
This robot doesn't look like Pandora,
but it DOES look like it could change
the flow of sand for us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
If I had more of my magic power, I could've
done it myself. Still, how can these machines
possibly change something so far away? Er, rhetorical question, by the way.
You don't have to answer it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Why is there a machine here
in the first place?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Okay, then could you tell me why there's
always a scarecrow next to a machine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
This robot doesn't look like Pandora,
but it DOES look like it could change
the flow of sand for us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hi, Sweetcrow! Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: In that case, could you find my cat?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Cats live in the ♥s of all scarecrows—
and you're totally welcome to take
my ♥ home, lover girl! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hee hee! Don't mind if I do!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Don't think I know you, friend.
Are you another junker?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Nope! I'm Ameya Aisling,
and I'm looking for my cat.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well now, that's some unusual treasure
you're out for. I mostly look for gears and
engine parts and showerheads and... Well,
you know. Things people want.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This place is a veritable mountain of treasure,
but because of that, I have a bunch of scoundrels
in here bugging me. ...See?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
They've been fighting a war ever since
Pandora opened up—even though the
world's like it is and no one has any
clue what the war is for anymore. Hell, I don't even know if we're supposed
to destroy this place or protect it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is a submarine:
protector of the ocean.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
But there's no ocean anymore, right?
So maybe we should tell these things
they're fighting over nothing.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: And why would you do that? I don't see what you're getting out of all this, friend.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
See, you get it! It's the not-knowing that
makes it a real treasure hunt; can't search
for something if you know it's guaranteed.
Anyway, good luck to you, friend.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This is the last place we haven't searched,
so I'm thinking Pandora might be here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Maybe.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Hi. I'm Ameya Aisling, and I'm looking
for my cat. Oh, and also Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Pandora, eh? Yes, I've heard the rumors:
Close the box and poof! The war is over.
Honestly, I have doubts that something
so convenient actually exists.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Still, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, as you've no doubt seen.
So if Pandora is anywhere, it's likely here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I wonder if someone's inside? Like maybe
whoever opened Pandora to begin with?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, if they went in as a human and
are still alive, no doubt they're some
kind of monster in their own right.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Then let's go hunt a monster!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Seems they were making machines in here,
but nothing works anymore. I guess the one
we just saw was the last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: No, listen. Something is still operational around here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Hey, look! Monsters over that way.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, this one is working.
What's it making?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sand. It's making sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You scarecrows are all the same:
liars to the last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Actually, it LOOKS like sand, but it's just
more machines! Wait, does that mean ALL
the sand in this world is little machines!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: ...Pretty sure it's just sand. But even if it was robots, what good would that do us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I THOUGHT it was weird that machines standing
around in the desert could change the flow
of sand so far away, and this explains how! It's a system that controls this entire
world by covering it with sand—and I
think Pandora is in charge of it all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, let's say you're correct, and the robots
covered the world in sand to win the war.
The war is over now, but the sand remains.
So how are we supposed to remove it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, first we should close Pandora 
and stop the sand production.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Ugh! No matter how many sand fiends we kill,
they just keep coming back. Who started
telling everyone that an outsider would
be the one to close Pandora, huh!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, we won't solve this problem with
tired brains. How about I keep watch
for a bit while you rest?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Ho, friend! Find any treasure?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Nope!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, everything good is buried beneath
the sand, so all you need to find it is
a little luck...and a secret weapon.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
My little friend here can find all sorts
of things buried in the sand. Poor thing managed to survive the war,
but can't seem to put it behind him.
Hoping this little treasure hunt of yours
can help him move past it for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
So long as it'll help with Pandora,
I'll take pretty much anyone with me.
What's your name, little guy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sarab.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, Sarab! I need you to find something
that'll help in our fight against Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: We believe in you, Sarab!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Did you figure out a way
to fight the sand yet?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
I think we just have to
throw ourselves in there.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Hey, looks like you found some
treasure. Good for you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Well done! Now it's our turn to show
our worth: we're going to turn the
Crowrealm into a world of sky and
water and green once more!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: So what's that mean for me?

SUB_W13_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Wow, a desert? I wonder if people
really live in places like this.
Well, let's get to exploring!

SUB_W13_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Pppbh! Blech! I got sand in my mouth!
And it tastes kinda...funky.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Heh. This doll has a pretty weird face,
but it still looks nicer than the ship.
I wonder why it's here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'm a talker, all right!
Haven't seen a human out this way
in quite a few days, though. So where'd you come from?
Cruise ship? Battleship? Submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Actually, my name's Ameya Aisling,
and I'm a witch from Pulchra.
Have you seen a cat around?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh! Okay, so my name is Scarecrow— er, not that you asked. But as for why I'm a scarecrow, I have no earthly idea. Also, I don't know any cats. Humans might know something though, so why not head over to the submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Okay, so I just got here, which means I
don't really know boo about this world.
Think you can take me to the submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One submarine, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Huh. I can't go any further—the flow of
sand is way too strong. Maybe a little
magic will get things going...? Nope. That didn't work.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Whoa, that machine's huge!
Does it work?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Hello, Sweetcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Scarecrow, baby! Good to see you! ♥
And sure, that's an easy ask. ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: You can change the flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Not me, hot stuff. But the robot can! ♥
Go on now, big guy! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
So this is the submarine? I wonder when
it was last...y'know? Sub-marining?
Also, do people really live in this thing?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Ooo, it's cool in here! Also no sand.
A witch could get used to this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, well! Not often we see outsiders
around these parts. Who might you be?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm Ameya Aisling, a witch of Pulchra.
I came here looking for my cat.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, joy. Another weirdo. Well, as you can see,
the Crowrealm has been devastated by war.
If there's something so nice as cats here,
I certainly don't know about it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
It's okay, my cat isn't like that at all.
It'll be around somewhere! I know it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, a cat worshipper. Joy and joy again.
Well, whatever. Feel free to look around
and see what you find; maybe you'll even
get lucky and locate a wayward feline.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Any idea where they might hang out?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
If you're asking me for a special place
out here in the desert, there's only
one option: Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Pandora? I feel like I've heard that
name from the Arch Witch before...
Something about misfortune sealed
away in a box in a distant world?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
And a scholar on top of everything.
If you know about Pandora, that means
it's likely infected your world as well.
Yet here you are, lookin' for cats.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, it can't be long now until this whole
world is devoured by Pandora, so I very
much hope you're able to locate it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: So you don't know where it is?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Oooh, but I know where it is! It could be here. Or there. Or way out that way someplace. Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wiser words were never spoken. Look,
just have Scarecrow take you where
you want to go; that's his job.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Another machine? You're not going to
tell me this is Pandora, are you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hi there. Hey. This metal hunk
isn't Pandora, is it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Wait, so it is? Or not?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, I suppose someone would have noticed
already if Pandora was just sitting here,
so let's check somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
That's another humongous machine!
I sure hope Pandora isn't in here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So there are fiends in this world, too?
Does the legend claim that the fiends
came from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So you know nothing. Great.
Well, guess it's time to peek inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Guess I'm glad there was no Pandora.
Let's go!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
And I hope you'll help us out if the
shifting sands block us again!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
This robot doesn't look like Pandora,
but it DOES look like it could change
the flow of sand for us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
If I had more of my magic power, I could've
done it myself. Still, how can these machines
possibly change something so far away? Er, rhetorical question, by the way.
You don't have to answer it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Why is there a machine here
in the first place?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Okay, then could you tell me why there's
always a scarecrow next to a machine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This robot doesn't look like Pandora,
but it DOES look like it could change
the flow of sand for us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
If you can do anything,
how about finding my cat?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: THE CATS ARE THE SCARECROWS! I'M THE CAT, BUDDY!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm Ameya Aisling, and I'm looking
for my cat. Oh, and also Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, so if Pandora is real,
this makes as much sense as anywhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Speaking of which, we've got
a war robot incoming!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Was that Pandora? That was nothing.
Certainly not the kind of calamity
we're used to in the Witchdom.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, I suppose it was a little pathetic
for an immortal war machine. You'll likely
have to keep searching somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
We'll look around and see what we find.
If nothing turns up, we'll be back.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: This looks like the place.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Could be Pandora, yep!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: This is Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Wait, you know about this place?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Uh, then couldn't you have closed
Pandora and put an end to this mess?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I am the Wiseman. Knowledge alone
is satisfaction enough.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, knowledge isn't enough for me,
so I'm going inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: In we go!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: The inside is totally broken.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Totally.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And yet, I hear a sound.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Wait, you followed me? I thought you
were happy just knowing things!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I do not know what lies inside.
Therefore, I must learn.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Then maybe also tell me whatever
else it is you know about Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora is sand. Pandora creates the sand.
It buries this world in mountains of sand,
causing it to suffocate.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So we just need to stop it from
creating sand? Why do I feel like
that's not going to be easy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: That I do not know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Then we should figure it out!
Let's go!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Let's go!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The sand is fiends.
The fiends are sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
That's not normal sand...
And it doesn't seem connected to
stuff like spirits in any way either.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora controls the sand. Every grain is
a perfect miniature recreation of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, NOW I get it! We can change the flow of
sand because we're manipulating every grain!
But my power isn't enough now to control
that much sand, so we need another option.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sounds like you found Pandora.
So what happens now?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Well, Pandora does look like a literal disaster, so I'm thinking about how I might be able to fight it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Why not try this thing?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I went ahead and fixed it up earlier.
I think it's some kind of search mech?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Hey, if this thing helps me fight Pandora,
I'm happy to give it a spin.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And we're off.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: The time to battle Pandora has come.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
Wow, you really do know everything.
That's exactly what I'm going to do!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
The sand has stopped.
Pandora has been sealed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Can't believe you managed to find Pandora and close it... Who are you, anyway?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Just some weirdo who worships cats— but it takes all kinds to save the world. Speaking of which, it's time for you to get back and save your own world, yes?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: I want to save worlds too!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: You can save them from here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is a ship, which means this desert
probably used to be an ocean. I wonder
what the heck happened here...

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Hmm? Okay, that's a weird doll.
Still, I guess its being here means
there are people nearby.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Whoa! Er, I mean, hello! I'm Ameya Aisling,
and it's super nice to meet you!
Also, I'm looking for my cat.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wonderful to meet you as well! I'm Scarecrow,
and I've been standing here for three thousand
days waiting for someone like you to come by.
Oh, but this is a glorious moment!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
That's, like, a REALLY long time.
Why is it that you're so happy to
have somebody come along?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: See, I'm a talker—I love talking. So where are you from, Ameya Aisling? The airship? The battleship? The cruise ship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Okay, so I just got here, which means I
don't really know boo about this world.
Think you can show me around?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One cruise ship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Huh. I can't go any further—the flow of
sand is way too strong. Maybe a little
magic will get things going...? Nope. That didn't work.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
This machine has SO many cannon thingies!
Er, it's not going to start suddenly attacking
if we get too close, is it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello, Strangecrow! I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: You can change the flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Do you ever give real answers?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
In that case, I'll assume he can change
the flow of the sand. Thanks!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Wow, this cruise ship doesn't look ready
to do much cruising now—although I don't
really understand how people here think.
Also, is my cat in here someplace?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Cat? No idea. But people? Yes.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
So this is what it's like inside, huh?
Gotta say, I LOVE the no-sand thing.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Hi! I'm Ameya Aisling, and I just came here
to find my cat. Also, I didn't bring wire or
anything like that. Sorry.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, I see. I thought you were a junker.
Well, I'm the Engineer, and I'm not
particularly interested in cats since
they don't make for good motive power.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Would you happen to know where cats
hang out in this world, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
In this sand-blighted hellhole? Hmmm...
Well, I suppose a place like that
would have to be Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Pandora? I know a myth from some world
with that name! It's how all calamities
were set free or something, right?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
In this world, Pandora is real. It is Pandora
that plunged this place into war and ruin,
and the horror of that continues to this day. So if we hope to free ourselves from all of
this someday, we must find a way to survive
and close Pandora once and for all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, gotcha. I think I know what
I'm supposed to do now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I won't know until I get there.
Do you have any clue as to where it is?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I have no idea where Pandora is.
I suggest you ask a scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course! You simply go this way,
then that way, then some way!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Another machine? You're not going to
tell me THIS is Pandora, are you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Then what ISN'T a silly thing
to ask a scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This robot doesn't look like Pandora,
but it DOES look like it could change
the flow of sand for us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
If you can do anything,
tell me where my cat is.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
That's another humongous machine!
I sure hope Pandora isn't in here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So there are fiends in this world, too?
Does the legend claim that the fiends
came from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So you know nothing. Anyway,
guess it's time to peek inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, I'm glad there was
no Pandora. Let's go!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas! Misery! A cat has come to reside
within me now that the fiends are gone!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
This robot doesn't look like Pandora,
but it DOES look like it could change
the flow of sand for us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Then can you tell me
where my cat is!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sure thing, sweet cheeks! ♥ Just ask
yourself this: what's the most special-est
place in the entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥
Here's a hint: it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
The most special-est place?
Uhhh, I have no idea.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This isn't Pandora; this isn't
the kind of calamity I know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Did I not just tell you
this is not Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I thought you knew everything!
Ugh. Fine. I'll find it myself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
And just what do you plan to do
once you actually find Pandora!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, if it's going to be anywhere,
it's gotta be here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Hiya. I'm Ameya Aisling, a witch from
Pulchra, and I'm looking for Pandora.
Is this the right place?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So the legends are true—an outsider will
open Pandora, and an outsider will close it!
Is this prophecy? An accurate prediction?
A cleverly executed program? Whatever it may be, one thing is certain:
history will now begin to move.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yes, well, introductions! I'm the Professor,
and I'm researching the Crowrealm's history.
I've spent hour after endless hour in this place,
but today, you will put an end to that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Okay, I feel like things are blowing up
real fast here. Is Pandora really going
to close up that easily?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I haven't the faintest idea; no one has
ever seen Pandora for themselves.
Even if it were inside this airship, I doubt
you'd gain access to it so easily.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, seems like I can just walk in,
so I guess I'll go check!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Let's go check!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, there's security here, but I don't
see anything that could be Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora's secrets lie deeper within.
Let's go, so I might witness history!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Deeper within!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Moving sand... So this is the truth of Pandora? It's just digging up sand from somewhere and scattering it all across our world? Absurd! Ridiculous! Complete and utter rot! I can't believe we let all time come to a standstill because we were afraid of this!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: This isn't sand—it's robots!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I get it now! It was never sand to begin
with—it was MACHINES! That's why we could
control how it was flowing!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I fear I don't understand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So every grain of sand is actually a little
machine, which means we're standing in
millions of 'em! This is NOT good!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Not good!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: We made it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yeah, we got out somehow—but what should
we do now? I mean, how are we supposed
to take out THAT many machines!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You can do it, girl! That's why the legend
says you will be the one to close Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
But I still don't know what I... Okay, stop it! You're Ameya, Witch of Pulchra,
and you won't let a bunch of little gadgets
beat you, no matter HOW many there are!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: No sir!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You will need power equal to Pandora's
own if you wish to fight it and win.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Please tell me if you know
something, oh wise Wiseman!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Use this. It hates Pandora, and may prove
a great aid in your upcoming fight.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Hate begets nothing!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: He is a REALLY weird dude.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Sarab will kill Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Aw, thanks, Sarab!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Wait, where are you going!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Where are you going!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
The time has come at last... Oh, to think
I might witness a turning point in history
with my own eyes.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
I'm going in. I'm gonna show this
thing what Ameya the Witch can do!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
Can you believe it!? I was actually
able to experience the moment
a legend became reality!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
You did it! You actually closed Pandora!
Ha ha haaa... Hey, wait. What the heck are
we supposed to do with the rest of our lives?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text: Yeah, what should I do with my life?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Wow, that's a massive ship! Also old.
I guess it's been sitting here for a
pretty long time.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Aw, that doll staring at it
looks kinda sad.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Actually, this place was already
a ruin when I got here!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Gyaaa! You can talk! I mean, uh, hi! My name's Ameya Aisling,
and I just came to this world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Heya, Scarecrow, I'm looking for my cat.
Have you seen any around?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Nope. But I know who we can ask.
Follow me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One battleship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Huh. I can't go any further—the flow of
sand is way too strong. Maybe a little
magic will get things going...? Nope. That didn't work.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
There's a machine all the way
out here? Huh. Does it work?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Hello, Smilecrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: 綱紀
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Aha ha ha ha ha! Scarecrow?
Aha ha ha ha ha! The flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: You can change the flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: The flow of sand! Aha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Man, that battleship looks super old.
Are there really people in here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I was a little worried about what it was
going to be like inside, but it's a
perfectly suitable place to live.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The arrival of souls from the
outside world is an omen.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: How'd you know I'm from the outside?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh my gosh, really!?
So you know where my cat is!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You name others liars, outsider,
and find only disappointment
in your own expectations. But very well! I shall reveal your fate:
you will find Pandora within the submarine.
All else must be decided by you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Do you know where the
submarine is, Scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Yes. I will take you there.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This machine's got nothing
to do with my cat, huh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: Do you know where my cat is?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
It's another machine.
I wonder if my cat's inside?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So there are fiends in this world, too?
Does the legend claim that the fiends
came from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
So you know nothing. Guess that
means it's time to peek inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, and that includes my cat.
Let's look somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Hope you're up for the job when
shifting sands cut us off again.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
It isn't like the machine absorbed
the cat's powers, right?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
What's the most special-est place in the
entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥ Here's a hint:
it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
The most special-est place?
Uhhh, I have no idea.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't think my cat's
gonna be here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Hey! Is it here or not!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Wow, that's a massive ship! Also old.
I guess it's been sitting here for a pretty
long time—makes me wonder what
the heck happened to this world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Sure did! I'm looking for my cat.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So you're not here to close Pandora? Blast!
Well, I am the Professor, a researcher of
the Crowrealm's history who is also seeking
a way to seal Pandora for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The last guy also mentioned Pandora.
He said I'd find it in the submarine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
That must have been Wiseman. In that case,
you must go to the submarine at once!
This place holds nothing for you!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: But we have an enemy incoming...

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Now go! Find the Junkman in the submarine,
and get his help to close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Okay, but I have no idea
what Pandora even is.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh, fine! I'll go to the submarine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
If this is a submarine, I guess this means
there used to be an ocean here. I wonder if
I'll actually find this Pandora thing inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Ah! An outsider has arrived, just as the
Wiseman foretold. He also claimed that the
closing of Pandora was all in your hands.
So then...will you close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Pandora is the cause of all desolation in
this world. It brought calamity to the land
and launched a war that rages to this day. And if we hope to right these most
terrible wrongs, we must close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: And you want me to do that?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
It is a job meant for you.
You will do it. For us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: For us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is all kinda fishy, but I also have a
feeling I need to find Pandora in order to
find my cat, so I guess I'll take a look.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Hm... Yeah, I don't really see
anything of interest here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Not as of yet, but the path goes on.
Now come. I know we will find it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: We'll find it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
And that's just sand. Look, does this Pandora
thing even EXIST, or are you just shoving all
of your responsibilities off onto a thing you
made up and called Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The sand... Of course! The sand is the cause of all this! The sand is Pandora! It was created here in this place, and once it spread across the Crowrealm, it sent the entire world to ruin.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
First Pandora, and now the sand?
Boy, you people really are good at
blaming others for your problems.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Yep! But also, Pandora doesn't exist.
That's the real meaning of what
the Wiseman said.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Is this true, Junkman?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Seems so. If this world is going to be saved,
it will be done not by an outsider, but by
the sweat and toil of those who live here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Well, I suppose that's not so bad; the Crowrealm is our home, after all, so it's only fitting that we should be the main characters in its story. You have my thanks—and I swear to you now, we will take our world back! We cannot thank you enough.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Hey, I'm happy to help,
but I still need my cat.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Then I'll be your cat!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Muh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Take good care of your
best pal Scarecrow, okay!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
So Pandora is really all this sand, huh?
But in that case, how am I supposed
to close it up?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Found it? It's been here all along!
All of this sand is Pandora, and I
honestly have no idea what I'm
supposed to do about it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
The sand is...? But no, that can't be!
The sand isn't attacking us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Oh my gosh, you're RIGHT! Without orders,
Pandora is just plain old sand! We need to find a way to
cut off Pandora's orders!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Wonderful! Now here, take this.
He's my little helper and a good,
fine boy, and I know he'll aid you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: Hello, helper! You got a name?

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
All right then, Sarab!
Let's find a way to fight Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
I appreciate that, even if you're
just trying to make me feel better.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The prophecy has been fulfilled,
and Pandora is closed at last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The Crowrealm has finally been returned to us,
and from this day forward, we shall restore it
to its former glory with our own hands!

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
I'm going to stay here and help
with the restoration.

SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W13_EVAR_AMYA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: Actually, you should come with me.
